title: Searching for how to share tabs between profiles.
content:
I have searched for "How to share tabs between profiles" in firefox.

I was offered this option:

Share multiple tabs 

   Visit the tabs tray by tapping the number next to the address bar, this number shows how many open tabs you have:    Tap the three-dot menu button in the tabs tray.    Select Share all tabs.    The list of tabs to be shared will appear.

Visit the tabs tray - not very clear. by tapping the number next to the address bar - which number? I have more tabs that can fit across the screen and am not seeing any number/s.

Could someone help me with this please? I have a lot of migration to do.
creator: teeny_weeny

title: ULTIMA VERSIONE FIREFOX NON COMPATIBILE CON SISTEMA OPERATVO
content: Ho installato l'aggiornamento di Firefox. (In automatico, senza pensarci due volte) Ma ho sostituito la versione precedente con quella appena scaricata!!!... Purtroppo 'la versione che ho scaricato non è supportata dal mio sistema operativo'! Quindi non posso usare questa versione. Mi serve la versione precedente che usavo prima, ma non riesco a trovarla. Il mio sistema operativo è MAC OS 10.11.6. GRAZIE, è URGENTE. Giovanna
creator: giovannadipli

title: Sipremo
content: Yesterday I foolishly accepted help from a Sammer. He told me that he was from Microsoft and there were errors and unwanted web pages on my computer. He used Supremo to manipulate things in my computer using Supremo which is still active. How do I delete supremo
creator: bcmartell1938

title: Huawei Fusion Solar oldal nem töltődik be a bejelnetkezés után
content: A Firefox legutóbbi frissítése után a Huawei Fusion solar oldala a bejelentkezés után nem töltődik be rendesen. Konkrétan nem látom a napelem rendszer termelési adatait, mert nem töltődnek be az adatok.
creator: simongdr

title: search for diamond
content: I type in diamond and I constantly get diamond forest products--not what i typed
creator: gstilwell

title: Annoying Pop Ups
content: Could you please tell me how to stop a.trust-core.xyz pop ups They keep popping up telling me my computer is infected and offer anything from a couple to numerous pop ups all the the same a.trust-core.xyz but pointing to to other security providers like Norton etc. My Malwarebytes professional and Windows scans show nothing. Best regards, Trevor
creator: trevor31

title: Font Size Changed in Config - Can't Change Back (MAC)
content:
I was trying to change Firefox's font size to 2, (in about:config) but accidentally typed in 22. Now the screen is so zoomed in that I can't use the browser at all. It's so close-up that the only thing it's able to display is the corner of the menu bar. If I try to access troubleshooting mode, I obviously can't, since it still will only show the corner of the page. Since it's the font that's the issue, and not an actual zoom option, trying command/control -/+/0 doesn't work either. I can't make the page wider, longer or pull it to the side to attempt to see other parts of the page, and I can't scroll down, up, sideways, anything. I feel like I've tried everything, and at this point I'm worried I'm going to have to make an entirely new Firefox account or something just because I mistyped one number, which I really don't want to have to do.

Feeling like a real idiot, please help me. Attached an image of what the page looks like whenever I open Firefox.
creator: madygrif

title: Firefox repeatedly crashing!
content:
Firefox has crashed ~6 or 7 times in the last 30 minutes. I've got a lot of tabs open, but that's always the case and hasn't ever been a problem before--and I tried closing ones that seemed tricky (youtube, google docs, etc.) with no changes. It crashed when I was in troubleshooting mode, so I don't think it's any extensions I've got running. It says I have the most recent version of Firefox. Nothing else on my computer is giving me any trouble.

Here's the most recent error message: bp-97a6fdd4-c953-4ed2-98d2-ee3c60220710
creator: juliet.carter.d

title: Can't open youtube
content: After the last Firefox update, i am trying to open youtube.com in my Firefox browser but it's not letting me to do it. Every time i open it shows an error and says that the error is from YOUTUBE and FIREFOX or I can do nothing about it. But the funny part is its working on other browsers like chrome.
creator: sharma99karambir

title: Firefox only partially working -cannot erase entries or add files to messages
content: FYI my internet provider, Rogers Telecomm. is recovering from a major system shutdown. Also, my Gmail account is working normally. With my Firefox account, it is working normally on my cellphone, but on my laptop, only the last 10 hours of messages are accessible, none of the essential tools (delete messages, etc.) on the toolbar are working, and I cannot attach files to messages I create. One more thing, the internet provider for my cellphone is not Rogers Telecomm, but is Virgin Plus. Is this a problem with Firefox, or is it caused by the problems that Rogers Telecomm is having getting their system back in operation?
creator: alaucis

title: Feedback on layout / colours / style as I was caught out.
content:
I am sorry, I recently said that buttons to open the profile directory were missing.

I was wrong.

But when you look at the screen where it is described and then you see the screen as I see it - with DARK THEME set you can see how/why I could easily miss seeing the button.

I feel there needs to be better ... separation (?) between the text and button. It is a lot easier to see in the light/default theme.
creator: teeny_weeny
